import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import Message from "../components/Message" import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./PlaceOrderScreen.css" const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.lenth === 0 ? Your cart is empty : (
{cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}
{item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
))}
)} Method: {cart.paymentMethod}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
